Description: eMagine Solutions have been retained by a global multinational giant with over 100,000 employees globally. They are undergoing a business transformation in Africa region. Based in their offices in Dubai, you will work on a transformation program focused around the commercial and operational lines of the business.We are seeking a strong consultant with excellent stakeholder management and change management experience. You should be comfortable with dealing with CxO and Director level and advising and challenging on business processes such as GTM, Business Development, Commercialization, Strategy.Candidates can come from either a business consultancy, management consultancy or global in-house practice.This is a 6 month contract position.Skills
Skills:
3+ years of experience in business consultancy, management consultancy or global in-house practice in a multinational company
Stakeholder management experience
Program Management experience
Business Development skills
